content.question: A player’s dominant strategy is

choices.label: independent of the other player’s choice
dependent on the other player’s choice
the strategy that results in the maximum combined payoff for both players
the strategy that always delivers the other player’s best outcome of the game
the strategy that always delivers the other player’s worst outcome of the game

content.answer: independent of the other player’s choice
